definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，双陆棋，红心大战，跳棋和翻转棋。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the realization of the simple network Chinese checkers game.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍的是实现简单的网络跳棋游戏。

sentences.english: When we play checkers I'll let you cheat…
sentences.chinese: 玩跳棋的时候我也会允许你耍赖。

sentences.english: They are playing a game of draughts .
Are you willing to play draughts with us after school?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意放学后和我们下国际跳棋吗？

sentences.english: Often the family plays board games or hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 一家人常常玩跳棋或者玩抓迷藏游戏。

sentences.english: The black-colored pieces, as in chess or checkers.
sentences.chinese: 国际象棋或西洋跳棋中的黑色棋子。

sentences.english: Draughts is an easier game than chess.
I always thought it was kind of a simple game, but I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得跳棋太简单，但还是接受了。

sentences.english: I used to play chinese checkers with my dad.
sentences.chinese: 我过去经常和我父亲玩跳棋。

definition: land battle chess, Chinese board game similar to Stratego
checkers (board and pieces for go 圍棋|围棋 or Chinese chess 象棋 etc)
